scripts.train_multimodal_model module¶

Helper script that builds the test-data LogisticRegression transformer and index. Intended to be run from the safire/source directory.

scripts.train_multimodal_model.check_model_dataset_compatibility(dataset, model_class)[source]¶
scripts.train_multimodal_model.layer_loading_infixes(load_layers)[source]¶

Parses the layers-to-load infixes. Returns a dict such that i-th layer infix has key i.

scripts.train_multimodal_model.layer_loading_init_args(layer_infixes, model_loader)[source]¶

Loads for each layer with infix specified by layer_infixes the appropriate init args. Returns the dict with init args as values.

scripts.train_multimodal_model.main(args)[source]¶
scripts.train_multimodal_model.parse_model_init_args(args)[source]¶

Creates a dict that can be passed like kwargs to the model’s setup() method.

Parameters:args – The argparse.Namespace that holds script command-line args.
Returns:The init arg dict.
scripts.train_multimodal_model.set_dataset_mode(args, dataset)[source]¶
